description.zh-cn: 春秋后期齐国外交家、思想家，历仕齐灵公、齐庄公、齐景公三朝，辅政长达五十余年。
description.en: A diplomat and thinker of the State of Qi in the late Spring and Autumn period, serving under Duke Ling, Duke Zhuang, and Duke Jing of Qi for over 50 years.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴的父亲，因宋国内乱而到齐国担任上大夫。
description.en: Father of Yan Ying, who served as a senior official (Shang Dafu) in the State of Qi after fleeing civil unrest in the State of Song.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴的儿子。
description.en: Son of Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期宋国君主，晏弱的曾祖父。
description.en: Duke Mu of Song, a ruler of the State of Song during the Spring and Autumn period and the great-grandfather of Yan Ruo.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国君主，晏婴曾为其臣。
description.en: Duke Ling of Qi, a ruler of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period, served by Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国君主，晏婴曾为其臣，后被大夫崔杼所杀。
description.en: Duke Zhuang II of Qi, a ruler of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period, served by Yan Ying and later assassinated by the official Cui Zhu.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国君主，晏婴长期辅佐他，并多次对其进行劝谏。
description.en: Duke Jing of Qi, a ruler of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period, whom Yan Ying served for a long time and frequently advised.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国大夫，因其妻与齐后庄公通奸而谋杀了庄公。
description.en: An official of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period who assassinated Duke Zhuang II for having an affair with his wife.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期楚国君主，晏婴出使楚国时曾与其会面。
description.en: King Ling of Chu, a ruler of the State of Chu during the Spring and Autumn period, whom Yan Ying met during a diplomatic mission.

description.zh-cn: 一位贤人，曾被囚禁，后被晏婴赎出并待为上宾。
description.en: A worthy man who was imprisoned and later ransomed and treated as an honored guest by Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 春秋末期的思想家、教育家，儒家学派的创始人。曾称赞晏婴。
description.en: A thinker, educator, and founder of Confucianism from the late Spring and Autumn period. He praised Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期儒家代表人物，曾评价晏婴以其君显。
description.en: A representative figure of Confucianism during the Warring States period, who commented that Yan Ying made his lord illustrious.

description.zh-cn: 孔子门生，儒家重要人物，曾称赞晏婴知礼。
description.en: A disciple of Confucius and a major figure in Confucianism, who praised Yan Ying for his understanding of propriety.

description.zh-cn: 西汉史学家，在《史记》中高度评价晏婴，并表达了对他的仰慕。
description.en: A historian of the Western Han dynasty who highly praised Yan Ying in the 'Records of the Grand Historian' and expressed his admiration for him.

description.zh-cn: 北宋文学家，曾作诗称赞晏婴“事君不以私”。
description.en: A writer of the Northern Song dynasty who wrote a poem praising Yan Ying for 'serving his lord without personal interest'.

description.zh-cn: 齐景公时期的大将之一，在“二桃杀三士”事件中自刎身亡。
description.en: One of the generals under Duke Jing of Qi, who committed suicide in the incident of 'Two Peaches Kill Three Warriors'.

description.zh-cn: 齐景公时期的大将之一，在“二桃杀三士”事件中自刎身亡。
description.en: One of the generals under Duke Jing of Qi, who committed suicide in the incident of 'Two Peaches Kill Three Warriors'.

description.zh-cn: 齐景公时期的大将之一，在“二桃杀三士”事件中自刎身亡。
description.en: One of the generals under Duke Jing of Qi, who committed suicide in the incident of 'Two Peaches Kill Three Warriors'.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝时期的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state during the Zhou dynasty in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝时期的诸侯国，晏婴祖籍地。
description.en: A vassal state during the Zhou dynasty in China, the ancestral home of Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝时期的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state during the Zhou dynasty in China.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期的一种高级官职。
description.en: A high-ranking official position during the Spring and Autumn period.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个时期，始于平王东迁，终于三家分晋。晏婴是此一时期的重要人物。
description.en: A period in Chinese history from approximately 770 to 476 BC. Yan Ying was an important figure during this time.

description.zh-cn: 一则历史典故，讲述晏婴利用计谋，通过两个桃子使三位恃功而骄的勇士自杀。
description.en: A historical anecdote about how Yan Ying used a stratagem with two peaches to cause three arrogant but accomplished warriors to kill themselves.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国莱地的一个地方，是晏婴的出生地。
description.en: A place in the Lai territory of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period, known as the birthplace of Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴是晏弱的儿子。
description.en: Yan Ying is the son of Yan Ruo.

description.zh-cn: 晏圉是晏婴的儿子。
description.en: Yan Yu is the son of Yan Ying.

description.zh-cn: 晏弱是宋穆公的曾孙。
description.en: Yan Ruo is the great-grandson of Duke Mu of Song.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴在其父晏弱于齐灵公二十六年（公元前558年）病逝后，继任为齐国上大夫，直至公元前500年去世。
description.en: After his father Yan Ruo passed away in the 26th year of Duke Ling of Qi (558 BC), Yan Ying succeeded him as the Shang Dafu (Senior Official) of the State of Qi until his death in 500 BC.

description.zh-cn: 晏弱因宋国内乱逃至齐国，担任齐国上大夫。
description.en: Yan Ruo fled to the State of Qi due to civil unrest in the State of Song and served as a Shang Dafu (Senior Official).

description.zh-cn: 晏婴是齐灵公的臣子。
description.en: Yan Ying was a minister to Duke Ling of Qi.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴是齐后庄公的臣子。
description.en: Yan Ying was a minister to Duke Zhuang II of Qi.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴是齐景公的臣子，长期辅佐并劝谏他。
description.en: Yan Ying was a minister to Duke Jing of Qi, serving and advising him for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 公元前548年，崔杼因齐后庄公与其妻子通奸而设局谋杀了他。
description.en: In 548 BC, Cui Zhu plotted and assassinated Duke Zhuang II for having an affair with his wife.

description.zh-cn: 作为齐国使臣出使楚国时会见楚灵王，并以智慧维护了国家尊严。
description.en: As an envoy of Qi, Yan Ying met with King Ling of Chu and defended the dignity of his state with his wisdom.

description.zh-cn: 多次劝谏齐景公，阻止其奢侈无度、大造宫室、加重刑罚等行为。
description.en: Repeatedly advised Duke Jing of Qi, dissuading him from extravagance, excessive construction of palaces, and harsh punishments.

description.zh-cn: 孔子称赞晏婴能体恤民情（“景公能行其所善也”），善于与人交往（“善与人交，久而敬之”），并称其为君子。
description.en: Confucius praised Yan Ying for being able to understand the people's suffering, for being skilled in interacting with others ('Good at associating with people, and respecting them over time'), and called him a true gentleman (junzi).

description.zh-cn: 晏婴在路上遇到被囚禁的贤人越石父，将他赎出并待为贵宾。
description.en: Yan Ying encountered the worthy man Yue Shifu in chains on the road, ransomed him, and treated him as an honored guest.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴设计了“二桃杀三士”的计谋，以除去三位恃功而骄的大将。
description.en: Yan Ying devised the stratagem of 'Two Peaches Kill Three Warriors' to eliminate three arrogant generals.

description.zh-cn: 在“二桃杀三士”事件中，公孙接因愧于功劳之争而自刎。
description.en: In the incident of 'Two Peaches Kill Three Warriors', Gongsun Jie committed suicide out of shame over the dispute for merit.

description.zh-cn: 在“二桃杀三士”事件中，田开疆因愧于功劳之争而自刎。
description.en: In the incident of 'Two Peaches Kill Three Warriors', Tian Kaijiang committed suicide out of shame over the dispute for merit.

description.zh-cn: 在“二桃杀三士”事件中，古冶子在另外两人死后，因羞愧而自刎。
description.en: In the incident of 'Two Peaches Kill Three Warriors', Gu Yezi committed suicide out of shame after the other two died.

description.zh-cn: 孟子称赞晏婴使其君主显名。
description.en: Mencius praised Yan Ying for making his ruler illustrious.

description.zh-cn: 曾子称赞晏婴知礼、恭敬。
description.en: Zengzi praised Yan Ying for his understanding of propriety and his reverence.

description.zh-cn: 司马迁在《史记》中高度评价晏婴，称其“进思尽忠，退思补过”，并表达了对他的仰慕。
description.en: Sima Qian highly praised Yan Ying in the 'Records of the Grand Historian', describing him as 'When advancing, he thought of utmost loyalty; when retreating, he thought of making up for faults,' and expressed his admiration.

description.zh-cn: 苏轼作诗称赞晏婴“事君不以私”。
description.en: Su Shi wrote a poem praising Yan Ying for 'serving his lord without personal interest'.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴出生于齐国莱地夷维。
description.en: Yan Ying was born in Yiwei, in the Lai territory of the State of Qi.
